english.segment1: Who compares to You?. Who set the stars in their place?. You who calmed the raging seas. That came crashing over me
english.segment2: Who compares to You?. You who bring the morning light.
english.segment3: The hope of all the earth. Is rest assured in Your great love
english.segment4: You are magnificent, eternally. Wonderful, glorious. Jesus. No one ever will compare to You. Jesus
english.segment5: Where the evening fades. You call forth songs of joy. As the morning wakes. We Your children give You praise
